homeHeader.title: From Registration to Expansion, Unlock Full Control & Global Reach with One Nexuz RAK Offshore Company Formation Services
homeHeader.description: Frustrated by restrictive ownership rules and high taxes that limit your growth? Enjoy 100% foreign ownership, 0% corporate tax, and full confidentiality by launching in the RAK offshore. With a fast-growing economy and boundless expansion opportunities, the zone is the perfect launchpad for international business. At One Nexuz, we make it simple for you to start, scale, and dominate internationally.

leftSection_5.title: Set Up in RAK Offshore in 6 Simple Steps with One Nexuz

items.title: Start With a Free Consultation
items.description: Kick off your RAK Offshore journey with a personalized session. We’ll explore your objectives — from holding assets to international investment — and recommend the ideal company structure and business activities.

items.title: Engage a Local Registered Agent
items.description: We assign a licensed RAK Offshore agent to act as your UAE representative. They handle all local correspondence, manage paperwork, and ensure your company setup complies with RAK regulations — without the need for a physical office.

items.title: Prepare & Submit Your Documents
items.description: Our team guides you in gathering and preparing the necessary paperwork, including MOA, AOA, shareholder IDs, and board resolutions. Your agent will file everything with the RAK Offshore authorities for approval.

items.title: Receive Official Incorporation Documents
items.description: Once approved, you’ll receive your Certificate of Incorporation, Share Certificates, and Board Resolutions — giving you full legal recognition as an RAK Offshore company.

items.title: Open Your Offshore Bank Account
items.description: We assist in setting up your corporate bank account, ensuring smooth onboarding for multi-currency transactions, international payments, and banking in line with global compliance standards.

items.title: Ongoing Compliance & Support
items.description: Our experts continue to provide end-to-end support — annual renewals, ownership changes, statutory record maintenance, and PRO services — keeping your RAK Offshore company fully compliant and operational.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up a RAK offshore company?
items.answer: It typically takes 3-5 business days, depending on your unique business activity, location, and document readiness.

items.question: What documents do I need to set up in RAK offshore?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passports, address proof, passport-sized pictures, and company purpose.

items.question: Can a RAK offshore company trade across the UAE?
items.answer: A RAK ICC company can sell, buy, and trade, but cannot conduct business within the UAE; however, you can transact globally.

items.question: What taxes do I need to pay in RAK offshore?
items.answer: A RAK offshore company is free from corporate and personal income tax. You’ll only have to pay about 5% import tax for bringing goods into the Emirates.

items.question: Do I get 100% foreign ownership of my RAK offshore company?
items.answer: Yes, RAK offshore provides you with full ownership of your company.
